Specimen Type: Fresh urine for leukocyte testing; heparinized blood or serum for beta-glucuronidase analysis
Purpose: To provide a standardized, CLIA-compliant method for accurate measurement of beta-glucuronidase activity and detection of leukocytes in human specimens.
Container: Sterile urine container; heparinized blood collection tube or serum separator tube
Equipment: Automated analyzer for beta-glucuronidase, Siemens Multistix reagent strips, temperature-controlled centrifuge
